ValidationRule.description: SF-93 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("[A-Z][A-Z][0-9][ ][0-9][A-Z][A-Z]"). Example: AA9 9AA.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s )), ISPICKVAL( Construction_Site_Address__CountryCode__s , "JE") ), NOT(REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][A-Z][0-9][ ][0-9][A-Z][A-Z]"))), FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Opportunity_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should consist of two uppercase letters, a number, followed by a space, a number and two uppercase letters. Example: AA9 9AA
